creditline: Gift of Mrs. Augustus L. Searle
description: Snuff bottle (one of pair 36.5.2-3), gold inlaid on two flat sides with a large floral spray of semi-precious stones. Smaller floral designs in semi-precious stones on narrow sides. Two handles formed of gold scrolls. Gilt stand.
medium: Brass with silver gilt, jade, glass, aquamarine, jadeite, rose quartz
title: Snuff Bottle
